sentences.en: A complete bipartite graph is a simple bipartite graph with bipartition.
sentences.cn: 完全偶图是具有二分类的简单偶图.

sentences.en: An orientation of a complete graph is called a tournament.
sentences.cn: 完全图的定向图称为竞赛图.

sentences.en: For simplicity we assume that the graph of the network is connected.
sentences.cn: 为了简便起见,假设网络的图是连通的.

sentences.en: If ( a, b ) ( ba ) then the graph is a directed graph.
sentences.cn: 如果 ( a, b ) ≠ ( b,a ),则这个图是有向图.

sentences.en: Line the pages for the graph both horizontally and vertically.
sentences.cn: 在这几页上同时画上横线和竖线,以便制作图表.

sentences.en: Martin showed me a graph of their recent sales.
sentences.cn: 马丁给我看了他们最近销售情况的图表。

sentences.en: Our soundings are displayed in the form of a graph.
sentences.cn: 我们的调查结果已用图表列出.

sentences.en: Plot a graph of height against age.
sentences.cn: 绘制一张身高与年龄对照的曲线图。

sentences.en: Since these eigenfunctions are equations we can graph them.
sentences.cn: 由于这些本征函数是方程,所以我们能以图来描绘.

sentences.en: The assertion is known as the closed graph theorem for Hilbert spaces.
sentences.cn: 这个断语被称为希耳伯特空间的闭图象定理.

sentences.en: The graph flattens out gradually after a steep fall.
sentences.cn: 图表上的曲线突降之后逐渐趋于平稳.

sentences.en: The graph shows a bulge in the birth rate.
sentences.cn: 图表显示出生率的暴增.

sentences.en: The graph shows a bulge in the price of meat.
sentences.cn: 图表显示肉类价格上涨.

sentences.en: The most striking feature of this graph is the lack of agreement.
sentences.cn: 本图象最明显的特征是缺乏一致性.

sentences.en: the vertical axis of the graph
We plot about eight points on the graph.
sentences.cn: 我们在图表上绘制出大约8个点的曲线。

words.tran_cn: 形象的；图表的；绘画似的
生动地；活灵活现地；用图表表示；轮廓分明地
[测] 制图学；制图法；图表算法
笔迹学；笔迹相法；图表法

phrases.tran_cn: 柱状图；条形图（等于bar chart）
场景图（应用广泛的虚拟世界构建技术）

trans.tran_en: a drawing that uses a line or lines to show how two or more sets of measurements are related to each other
